text: Leslie Roger Wootton (29 June 1944 â€“ 5 July 2017) was an English aeronautical engineer and balloonist. He was dean of engineering for City University and in 1966 prepared a report on the aircraft maintenance industry for the British Civil Aviation Authority. Wootton died on 5 July 2017 in London at the age of 73. == References == Category:1944 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Scientists from London Category:British engineers Category:Aerospace engineers
title: Roger Wootton
